Chipped Topaz

(3 Socket)

 Weapon
 6% Chance To Cast Level 3 Chain Lightning On Striking

Adds 3-36 Lightning Damage
Slows Target by 6%
Attacker Takes Lightning Damage of 15

12% Better Chance of Getting Magic Items
Shocking

Gloves

+12% Faster Run/Walk
Replenish Life +18
Regenerate Mana 30%

Cold Resist +10%
